content: निपातन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Killing, destroying. --नं {@--1@} Throwing down, beating or knocking down; <ls>Ms. 11. 209.</ls> {@--2@} Overthrowing, destroying, killing. {@--3@} Touching with. {@--4@} Putting down as irregular or exceptional. {@--5@} An irregular form of a word, irregularity, exception. {@--6@} Falling or flying down.
